status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

components.data: The culture should be in an actively growing state (log phase or exponential growth) to ensure optimum health and good recovery. Ideally, the culture medium should be changed 24 hours prior to harvesting
components.name: Description

source_data.description: The culture should be in an actively growing state (log phase or exponential growth) to ensure optimum health and good recovery. Ideally, the culture medium should be changed 24 hours prior to harvesting

components.data: Label the 1.5ml cryogenic vials and add 200ml of 50% (v/v) glycerol
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Label the 1.5ml cryogenic vials and add 200ml of 50% (v/v) glycerol

components.data: Add 800ml of active sterile cell culture to this 200ml of 50% (v/v) glycerol, so that overall storage in 10% (v/v) glycerol
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 800ml of active sterile cell culture to this 200ml of 50% (v/v) glycerol, so that overall storage in 10% (v/v) glycerol

components.data: Transfer the vials to the controlled freezing unit of at least 1°C/min to retain optimal viability and put the box in -80°C for short storage and in liquid nitrogen for long term storage.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer the vials to the controlled freezing unit of at least 1°C/min to retain optimal viability and put the box in -80°C for short storage and in liquid nitrogen for long term storage.
